title: Qin Shi Ming Yue Zhi: Luosheng Tangxia
synopsis: A single episode special that was released on a web-tour game to coincide with the movie release. This special tells of a young Taoist who joins the Yin-Yang School to find his sister.
related_anime: ['Qin Shi Ming Yue 3D: Dianying Longteng Wanli', 'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Bai Bu Fei Jian', 'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Wanli Changcheng', 'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Zhu Zi Bai Jia', 'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Ye Jin Tianming', 'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Junlin Tianxia']
